casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Ida SCHECHTER, Appellant, v. SUPERINTENDENT OF CENTRAL ISLIP STATE HOSPITAL and Benjamin M. Day et al., Appellees. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Decided February 18, 1929. No. 261. Max J. Kohler and Anthony Romano, both of New York City, for appellant. William A. De Groot, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Herbert H. Kellogg, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
